body_html:
@dadib: Thanks for providing a minimal example.

Digging a bit, I believe the same issues as in #8284 that should be fixed at head (and will be fixed in the next release - 1.1). Could you try with the nightly builds:

  • Java source: https://ci.tensorflow.org/view/Nightly/job/nightly-libtensorflow/TYPE=mac-slave/lastSuccessfulBuild/artifact/lib_package/libtensorflow.jar
  • JNI: https://ci.tensorflow.org/view/Nightly/job/nightly-libtensorflow/TYPE=mac-slave/lastSuccessfulBuild/artifact/lib_package/libtensorflow_jni-cpu-darwin-x86_64.tar.gz

And then switch to 1.1 when that is released?

body:
@dadib: Thanks for providing a minimal example. 

Digging a bit, I believe the same issues as in #8284 that should be fixed at head (and will be fixed in the next release - 1.1). Could you try with the nightly builds:

- Java source: https://ci.tensorflow.org/view/Nightly/job/nightly-libtensorflow/TYPE=mac-slave/lastSuccessfulBuild/artifact/lib_package/libtensorflow.jar
- JNI: https://ci.tensorflow.org/view/Nightly/job/nightly-libtensorflow/TYPE=mac-slave/lastSuccessfulBuild/artifact/lib_package/libtensorflow_jni-cpu-darwin-x86_64.tar.gz

And then switch to 1.1 when that is released?
